translators.description: Help bring international novels to new audiences. Join our translation program and contribute to global literature.

research.title: Academic Research

integration.description: Integrate our novel reading API into your mobile apps or websites to provide reading content to your users.

marketResearch.title: Market Research
marketResearch.description: Access reading trends and user behavior data to understand market preferences and content consumption patterns.
